meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call meeting to order and declare a quorum is established.
Motion for Chair to preside over the Special Called Meeting.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 5 through 6
Review and consider the Meeting Record of the January 16, 2025 special called joint meeting.
agenda_items.description: Review and consider the Meeting Record of the January 16, 2025 special called joint meeting of the City Center TIF District Board of Directors, Downtown Connection TIF District Board of Directors, and the Downtown Dallas Development Authority Board of Directors.

agenda_items.title: Review and consider an amendment of the Downtown Connection TIF District Project Plan.
agenda_items.description: Review and consider an amendment of the Downtown Connection TIF District Project Plan and Reinvestment Zone Financing Plan to add a provision for a directed sale of an approximately 1.09 acre property and reprogram $6,980,602 2006 NPV dollars to support the relocation and development of a new Fire Station No. 18.
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and Forward a Recommendation of Approval to the City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consider a development agreement with Tango North RF, LLC.
agenda_items.description: Review and consider a development agreement with Tango North RF, LLC for the Fire Station No. 18 Relocation Project in an amount not to exceed $29,399,487.
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and Forward a Recommendation of Approval to the City Council

financial_items.description: Reprogramming of funds for Fire Station No. 18 relocation.
Development agreement for Fire Station No. 18 Relocation Project.
